assignments.description: For Testing Send Email and Notification.
assignments.name: assignRecordOwner
assignments.label: assignRecordOwner

assignments.description: For Testing Send Email and Notification.
assignments.name: assignTrader_0
assignments.label: assignTrader

rules.name: SubmitInitialFinalRisk
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: SubmitInitialFinalRisk

Flow.description: [26-Jun-2024] - Edit condition for getting CPCE from metadata (Element: getCPCESubmitVerMeta). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBSubmitVerMeta). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRSubmitVerMeta). - Edit condition for getting CPCE from metadata (Element: getCPCEShiptoFinalRiskMeta). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRAddInfoMeta). - Edit condition for getting TRCR S/H from metadata (Element: getTRCRSHAddInfoMeta). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBAddInfoMetaCredit). - Edit condition for getting FALB S/H from metadata (Element: getFALBAddInfoMetaCreditHead). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getTRCRFinalRiskMeta). - Edit condition for getting FATX from metadata (Element: getFATXFinalRiskMeta). - Edit condition for getting FATX S/H from metadata (Element: getFAMgrFinalRiskMeta). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: getFALBFinalRiskMeta). - Edit condition for getting FATX from metadata (Element: getFATXFinalRiskMeta_HighHighTX). [28-Jun-2024] - Check Record Type Customer & Supplier in TXLowandMediumFinalRisk [29-Jun-2024] Update Subject in "SubmitAddInfoEmailSubject"

formulas.name: InitialFinalRiskHHEMailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA] Not to Further Proceed for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: InitialFinalRiskHighEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA]: Enhance Due Diligence Required for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: InitialFinalRiskLowandMediumEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "]: New Registration require for credit evaluation: " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: InitialFinalRiskTOPSupplierEmailSubject
formulas.expression: '[FYA][' & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & ']: Informing for Approval of New ' & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & ' Registration: ' & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: LABIXSubmitVerNotifyBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} + " has a high risk level of Compliance Risk."

formulas.name: LABIXSubmitVerNotifyTitle
formulas.expression: "[FYA] Initial: " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & " Required for Check Ship to Country"

formulas.name: SubmitAddInfoNotiBody
formulas.expression: "Please review and consider submitted Additional Information"

formulas.name: TOPSubmitVerNotifyBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} + " has a high risk level of Compliance Risk."

formulas.name: TXInitialFinalRiskHHEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA] Initial:"&{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} &"Enhance Due Diligence Required for New Customer Registration is not pass"

Flow.label: CTRTriggerReqItemUpdateAfterSubmit

textTemplates.name: CusSubmitAddInfoEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfFinancial__c} Team,

{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} uploaded documents for your verification.
Please see the details and proceed via this link.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Request Number: {!$Record.Name}


Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: InitialFinalRiskHHEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high-high risk level in sanction and compliance, And not proceed with the counterparty registration. Please inform the customer.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Best Regards,
Conterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: InitialFinalRiskHighEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.LastName},


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high risk level in sanction and compliance.

Please review due diligence result by proceed via this link and further process Enhanced Due Diligence.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: InitialFinalRiskLowandMediumEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfFinancial__c} Team,

{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} requires your credit evaluation.
Please see the details and proceed via this link.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} 

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Responsible Trader Decision:{!$Record.TraderPreScreenDecision__c}

Responsible Trader Comment: {!$Record.TraderPreScreenComment__c}


Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: InitialFinalRiskTOPSupplierEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},

We would like to inform that {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} was Approved.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}


Please see the details and proceed via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: SupSubmitAddInfoEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfFinancial__c} Team,

{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} uploaded documents for your verification.
Please see the details and proceed via this link.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

textTemplates.name: TXInitialFinalRiskHHEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},


  We regret to inform you that {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has a high-high risk level in Compliance and does not meet the criteria for counterparty registration. Please notify your customer about this situation as soon as possible.


Please see due diligence result by proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatic generated email, please do not reply to this email address"
